metadata.title: CVE-2023-0485 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab affecting all versions starting from13.11 before 15.8.5, all versions starting from 15.9 before 15.9.4, allversions starting from 15.10 before 15.10.1. It was possible that a projectmember demoted to a user role to read project updates by doing a diff witha pre-existing fork.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
